ssot__Opportunity__dlm.name: Opportunity
ssot__Opportunity__dlm.description: The Opportunity DMO represents deals or sales that are in progress.

ssot__CloseDate__c.description: The date when the opportunity was closed.

ssot__ContractId__c.description: A reference ID to contract associated with order.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date a record was created.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency of the sales opportunity.

ssot__CustomerAccountId__c.description: A reference ID to business or person that is prospective buyer of opportunity's product or service.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name for system that is source of records identified by External Record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EngagementChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to the business or company that serves as a provider for engagement channel type.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to method of message delivery, for example email, phone call, SMS message, or TV commercial.

ssot__ExpectedRevenueAmount__c.description: The calculated revenue based on amount and probability fields.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsPrivate__c.description: An indicator if an opportunity can be shared with someone outside the opportunity team.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LeadId__c.description: A reference ID to person or company that shows interest in company's products.

ssot__LeadSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to source where lead was obtained.

ssot__NextStep__c.description: A description of the next task needed to close an opportunity.

ssot__OpportunityForecastCategoryId__c.description: A reference ID to a revenue probability category within the sales cycle.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Opportunity DMO.

ssot__OpportunityStageId__c.description: A reference ID to phase or step of opportunity, for example, new, won, or closed.

ssot__OpportunityTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of opportunity, for example, new or existing business.

ssot__PartnerAccountId__c.description: A reference ID to external business supporting or participating in opportunity.

ssot__PriceBookId__c.description: A reference ID to sets of prices tailored to different needs. Using price books, each product can have many different prices.

ssot__Probability__c.description: The probability of closing an opportunity.

ssot__TotalAmount__c.description: The estimated amount of the total sale.

ssot__TotalProductQuantity__c.description: The total quantity value for all products, if the opportunity has products associated.
